name: Yoshimitsu Aoki
content: Aoki Media Sensing Laboratory, Keio University Member Prof. Yoshimitsu AOKI, Ph.Dã€€aoki@elec.keio.ac.jp He received the B.E, the M.E. and the Dr.E in Applied Physics all from Waseda University in 1996, 1998, 2001 respectively.He is currently a Professor at the Dept. of Electronics and Electrical Engineering of Keio University.His research interests have been in image processing, computer vision, pattern recognition and artificial intelligent system.
